snippet.title: 3D Narrow Escape - Vectrex
snippet.description:
This is a complete playthrough of 3D Narrow Escape for the Vectrex.
Review and scores in description.

Pros
+ Smooth animation
+ Good 3D graphics

Cons
- A small warning before the boss fight would be good.



Score (out of 10)

  Graphics  := 6.5
  Sound   := 5.5
  Controls   := 7
  Gameplay  := 5.5
  Replayability  := 6
  Enjoyment  := 6
  Technical  := 7.5

  Overall   := 6.5

Gaming Exhibit Score  := 63.1%

Synopsis
A challenging shooter that used the 3D headset / imager.
